entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 1:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 65 %
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: ENE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of hail in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the water in the morning. Wind becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
